arktsVersion_1_0.messageText: Using "this" inside stand-alone functions is not supported (arkts-no-standalone-this)
Some of utility types are not supported (arkts-no-utility-types)
"typeof" operator is allowed only in expression contexts (arkts-no-type-query)

arktsVersion_1_1.messageText: Using "this" inside stand-alone functions is not supported (arkts-no-standalone-this)
Some of utility types are not supported (arkts-no-utility-types)
"typeof" operator is allowed only in expression contexts (arkts-no-type-query)
